environment: Environment name eg. prod, dev, stage
description: A short description of the project.
postgres_host: Hostname or IP for postgres database
postgres_port: Port number where postgres is listening on postgres_host
postgres_user: Username of postgres db to connect to
prefect_api_server: Endpoint for Prefect GraphQL API server
aws_access_key_id: AWS Access key ID used by MLflow
aws_secret_access_key: AWS Secret key used by MLflow
s3_endpoint_url: S3 Endpoint URL used by MLflow
